mapper.sql: t_vehicleinfo.vehicleId as vehicleId ,t_vehicleinfo.deviceFactoryNo as deviceFactoryNo ,t_vehicleinfo.lightswitchsupplier as lightswitchsupplier ,t_vehicleinfo.purchaseDate as purchaseDate ,t_vehicleinfo.wheelaxlesModel as wheelaxlesModel ,t_vehicleinfo.brakeshoreModel as brakeshoreModel ,t_vehicleinfo.electricboxModel as electricboxModel ,t_vehicleinfo.wiperSupplier as wiperSupplier ,t_vehicleinfo.tirepressureSupplier as tirepressureSupplier ,t_vehicleinfo.deviceId as deviceId ,t_vehicleinfo.tireModel as tireModel ,t_vehicleinfo.dayRunTime as dayRunTime ,t_vehicleinfo.gearBoxModel as gearBoxModel ,t_vehicleinfo.lineInfo as lineInfo ,t_vehicleinfo.sim as sim ,t_vehicleinfo.motorSupplier as motorSupplier ,t_vehicleinfo.alarm as alarm ,t_vehicleinfo.gasCost as gasCost ,t_vehicleinfo.expireDate as expireDate ,t_vehicleinfo.eleCost as eleCost ,t_vehicleinfo.vehicleType as vehicleType ,t_vehicleinfo.paymentStatus as paymentStatus ,t_vehicleinfo.isReparing as isReparing ,t_vehicleinfo.engineModel as engineModel ,t_vehicleinfo.fsbSupplier as fsbSupplier ,t_vehicleinfo.oilBoxCap as oilBoxCap ,t_vehicleinfo.seatSupplier as seatSupplier ,t_vehicleinfo.batteryModel as batteryModel ,t_vehicleinfo.deptId as deptId ,t_vehicleinfo.heaterSupplier as heaterSupplier ,t_vehicleinfo.oilCost as oilCost ,t_vehicleinfo.lastAlarmTime as lastAlarmTime ,t_vehicleinfo.vehicleNo as vehicleNo ,t_vehicleinfo.absModel as absModel ,t_vehicleinfo.paymentExpiredDate as paymentExpiredDate ,t_vehicleinfo.dynamoModel as dynamoModel ,t_vehicleinfo.doorpumpModel as doorpumpModel ,t_vehicleinfo.producer as producer ,t_vehicleinfo.online as online ,t_vehicleinfo.engineVinNo as engineVinNo ,t_vehicleinfo.batteryCap as batteryCap ,t_vehicleinfo.vehicleSN as vehicleSN ,t_vehicleinfo.airBottleCap as airBottleCap ,t_vehicleinfo.motorType as motorType ,t_vehicleinfo.status as status ,t_vehicleinfo.lastDataUpTime as lastDataUpTime
mapper.insert:
insert into t_vehicleinfo
vehicleId, deviceFactoryNo, lightswitchsupplier, purchaseDate, wheelaxlesModel, brakeshoreModel, electricboxModel, wiperSupplier, tirepressureSupplier, deviceId, tireModel, dayRunTime, gearBoxModel, lineInfo, sim, motorSupplier, alarm, gasCost, expireDate, eleCost, vehicleType, paymentStatus, isReparing, engineModel, fsbSupplier, oilBoxCap, seatSupplier, batteryModel, deptId, heaterSupplier, oilCost, lastAlarmTime, vehicleNo, absModel, paymentExpiredDate, dynamoModel, doorpumpModel, producer, online, engineVinNo, batteryCap, vehicleSN, airBottleCap, motorType, status, lastDataUpTime,
#{vehicleId}, #{deviceFactoryNo}, #{lightswitchsupplier}, #{purchaseDate}, #{wheelaxlesModel}, #{brakeshoreModel}, #{electricboxModel}, #{wiperSupplier}, #{tirepressureSupplier}, #{deviceId}, #{tireModel}, #{dayRunTime}, #{gearBoxModel}, #{lineInfo}, #{sim}, #{motorSupplier}, #{alarm}, #{gasCost}, #{expireDate}, #{eleCost}, #{vehicleType}, #{paymentStatus}, #{isReparing}, #{engineModel}, #{fsbSupplier}, #{oilBoxCap}, #{seatSupplier}, #{batteryModel}, #{deptId}, #{heaterSupplier}, #{oilCost}, #{lastAlarmTime}, #{vehicleNo}, #{absModel}, #{paymentExpiredDate}, #{dynamoModel}, #{doorpumpModel}, #{producer}, #{online}, #{engineVinNo}, #{batteryCap}, #{vehicleSN}, #{airBottleCap}, #{motorType}, #{status}, #{lastDataUpTime},
mapper.update:
update t_vehicleinfo
deviceFactoryNo=#{deviceFactoryNo},
lightswitchsupplier=#{lightswitchsupplier},
purchaseDate=#{purchaseDate},
wheelaxlesModel=#{wheelaxlesModel},
brakeshoreModel=#{brakeshoreModel},
electricboxModel=#{electricboxModel},
wiperSupplier=#{wiperSupplier},
tirepressureSupplier=#{tirepressureSupplier},
deviceId=#{deviceId},
tireModel=#{tireModel},
dayRunTime=#{dayRunTime},
gearBoxModel=#{gearBoxModel},
lineInfo=#{lineInfo},
sim=#{sim},
motorSupplier=#{motorSupplier},
alarm=#{alarm},
gasCost=#{gasCost},
expireDate=#{expireDate},
eleCost=#{eleCost},
vehicleType=#{vehicleType},
paymentStatus=#{paymentStatus},
isReparing=#{isReparing},
engineModel=#{engineModel},
fsbSupplier=#{fsbSupplier},
oilBoxCap=#{oilBoxCap},
seatSupplier=#{seatSupplier},
batteryModel=#{batteryModel},
deptId=#{deptId},
heaterSupplier=#{heaterSupplier},
oilCost=#{oilCost},
lastAlarmTime=#{lastAlarmTime},
vehicleNo=#{vehicleNo},
absModel=#{absModel},
paymentExpiredDate=#{paymentExpiredDate},
dynamoModel=#{dynamoModel},
doorpumpModel=#{doorpumpModel},
producer=#{producer},
online=#{online},
engineVinNo=#{engineVinNo},
batteryCap=#{batteryCap},
vehicleSN=#{vehicleSN},
airBottleCap=#{airBottleCap},
motorType=#{motorType},
status=#{status},
lastDataUpTime=#{lastDataUpTime},
where vehicleId=#{vehicleId}
